text: <s>[INST] User: Schedule a brake inspection for tomorrow afternoon. [/INST] I’ve scheduled a brake inspection for tomorrow at 2 PM. Would you like me to send a confirmation?</s>
<s>[INST] User: Where can I check my car’s service history? [/INST] You can view your Toyota service history in the Toyota Owners app or at your local service center.</s>
<s>[INST] User: Cancel my current service appointment. [/INST] Your service appointment has been canceled. Would you like to reschedule it for another day?</s>
